did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Census of Surviving Confederate Veterans in Wythe County (reprinted), 1897
did.abstract: This collection consists of a printed list of Confederate veterans living in Wythe County, Virginia, in 1897.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Census of Confederate Veterans in West End of Wyth County must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Census of Surviving Confederate Veterans in Wythe County, Ms2013-063, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased by Special Collections in 2013.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Census of Surviving Confederate Veterans in Wythe County was completed in September 2013.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a printed list from a 1896 county census of surviving Confederate veterans in Wythe County. The original publication date is 1897. The reprint date is unknown.
